thread.title: American Communications Solutions Acquires Ellumen Inc’s VA IT Support Services Under the T4NG Contract

author: cnbc.com
title: American Communications Solutions Acquires Ellumen Inc’s VA IT Support Services Under the T4NG Contract

organizations.name: american communications solutions acquires ellumen inc

text:
FAIRFAX STATION, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- American Communications Solutions (ACS), LLC, has acquired the Ellumen Inc. business unit that provides information technology support services to the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) under the Transformation Twenty-One Total Technology Next Generation (T4NG) acquisition program.
“As a Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned small business, ACS is honored to have the opportunity to provide integrated Information Technology solutions and services to meet VA’s goals and ultimately improve the capabilities provided to our Nation’s great Veterans,” said John M. Schleifer, President and CEO of ACS.
T4NG is a Multi-Agency (MAC) Indefinite Delivery/Indefinite Quantity (IDIQ) Multiple Award Task Order (MATO) contract with a base ordering period of five years and one five-year option period, with a program ceiling of $22.3 billion. The contract is managed by VA’s Technology Acquisition Center in Eatontown, New Jersey. T4NG is an acquisition program that offers a full range of information technology support services that include infrastructure improvements, cyber security, and operations and network management.
About American Communications Solutions (ACS), LLC: ACS is a CVE verified, Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) that provides information technology, cybersecurity, engineering and operational support services to customers in the Federal Government.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180522006429/en/
American Communications Solutions, LLC
